channel.title: üè¢ Intel Labs on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Intel Labs on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: A Structure-Aware Framework for Learning Device Placements on Computation Graphs
item.description: Learn optimal device placement for neural networks with HSDAG, a novel framework boosting inference speed by up to 58.2%!

item.title: MIDGArD: Modular Interpretable Diffusion over Graphs for Articulated Designs
item.description: MIDGARD: Generate high-quality, simulatable 3D articulated assets with enhanced control and interpretability using a novel diffusion-based framework.

item.title: ScaleKD: Strong Vision Transformers Could Be Excellent Teachers
item.description: ScaleKD: Pre-trained vision transformers make excellent teachers for diverse student networks, improving efficiency and performance in knowledge distillation.

item.title: Slack-Free Spiking Neural Network Formulation for Hypergraph Minimum Vertex Cover
item.description: A novel slack-free spiking neural network efficiently solves the Hypergraph Minimum Vertex Cover problem on neuromorphic hardware, outperforming CPU-based methods in both speed and energy consumption.
